name: Calyx Point Borrower File
summary: Learn about .BRW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BRW files are created from .PRS prospect files when a prospective borrower is identified for loan origination.

description: File used by Calyx Point, a program used to create and manage mortgage loans; contains loan financial data for the borrower; used to track loan status information between a lender and borrower.
